General.Name: Prajay Engineers Syndicate Limited
General.Description: Prajay Engineers Syndicate Limited, a real estate company, engages in the development, construction, and maintenance of residential, commercial, hospitality, and retail properties in India. It operates in Real Estate, and Hotels and Resorts segments. The Real Estate segment is involved in the development, sale, management, and operation of town ships and housing projects, which include leasing of self-owned commercial premises. The Hotels and Resorts segment maintains hotels, restaurants, and resorts. Prajay Engineers Syndicate Limited was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Hyderabad, India.

1.Name: Mr. Bhaskara Rao Patnana
1.Title: GM of Accounts & Fin. and CFO
